website_summaries.verdict: Offers a small kibble size that's perfect for little dogs, while improving coat health.
pros: Includes fatty acids and vitamin E to aid in skin and coat development
Offers the protein your dog needs for lean muscle development and maintenance
Easier to digest than some other dog foods
cons: A little pricier per pound than some others

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like it, I have also witnessed him licking his ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like it, I have also witnessed him licking his own butt so I really don't know how delicate his taste buds are.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed between batches and made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 5lb bag of this food at a local petsmart. My dog handled it great so I went ahead and bought a 35lb bag. The bits looks different compared the first bag and unfortunately gave my pup diarrhea. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: A little background, I have two dogs with one being a picky eater and the other which will eat just about anything. The picky eater also has a history of having an upset stomach. After months of searching and rotating our dog foods we finally tried Hills Science Diet as the wet food was recommended by our vet. We have ordered this product for the past 3 years and both dogs can't get enough of it. The picky eater has never gotten sick and continues to eat her dog food! They are both in great health and for the amount we order it lasts about 2 months. So it is perfect for using the Amazon Subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: Would like it better if they made a food that includes natural stuff less grain and meal
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: It is full of grain and unwanted ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The added grain. Got both dogs off of this and they are losing unwanted fat. Plus they are having softer bowel movements instead of very hard ones. Went with all natural no grain. I can now read the ingredient list without looking them up. Plus now that I got them off of it they no longer have skin yeast. Saying goodbye to this product
customer_reviews.author: rainbow brite

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended, dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: We love this food for our dogs. Our vet recommended we get the Hill's Science Diet and we haven't looked back. We have a boxer, chocolate lab mix and Italian greyhound mix and they devour this food. The box is older and with age comes digestive issues. Before we switched her to Hill's Science Diet, she would get constipated at least once a month and we tried numerous foods. Since switching in 2016 she hasn't had any digestion issues. They love this food and even though its a little more expensive than some of those other brand foods in my opinion it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Science Diet is the Answer for Most Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a two-year old havenese who loves and lives on Science Diet. Our vet is thrilled with our choice. It is quality, nutritious, dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Southern-Woman

customer_reviews.title: Veterinarian Recommended
customer_reviews.text: There aren’t too many dog foods that my snobby dog will eat, especially when their are other alternatives. Surprisingly, Alison will eat some people food and go eat this dog food afterward as well. She hadn’t done that with any other dog food. Typically, she wouldn’t touch her dog food for days. Yes she’s spoiled, but she’s my baby so I give her what she wants. My Vet recommended that I feed her this, gave me a sample bag that Alison loved and now I’ll be subscribing to it.
customer_reviews.author: xposr63

customer_reviews.title: Hate the new shipping method
customer_reviews.text: The product is great I get it every month and have for 2years. That said it normally comes is the compact red box shown in the picture that fits neatly on the shelf. The delivery today was a bag of food thrown in a box 4 times to big. Please go back to the original packaging. Update 01Nov 2019, they have returned to the old shipping method. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not "Light" Food as Described
customer_reviews.text: While the Amazon description says this is Adult "Light" food, it is not. Its just regular adult dog food.
customer_reviews.author: ItGirl

customer_reviews.title: Dog throws up
customer_reviews.text: I have a girl pug who eats everything and anything. She's the first to finish her food. When she eats this dog food, she throws it up. The first time I thought she ate something she shouldn't have. The second time, she wouldn't eat the food. We had to get the other two dogs to crowd around her for her to slowly eat half a cup. She threw it up again. Maybe something is in it because this is the first time she wouldn't eat her dinner. Very unhappy pug and not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Q.

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Science Hill Diet is The Healthiest pet food made... vets Highly recommend it and feed it to their own fur babies I have been feeding it to my babies for quite some time now NEVER been an issue Only good for them
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: My picky lil guy loves this
customer_reviews.text: I started my dog on "designer" dog food as a puppy with only the best ingredients (no fillers or by-products in the first few ingredients) but he started to have heart problems as he got older. I found out that the brand I was using didn't have taurine which is essential to heart health in dogs. Unfortunately my lil guy is super picky, so it took a while to find a new brand with ingredients that were good and that he would actually eat. This specific formula of Science Diet (I tried others first) is the only one that he eats. In addition, I give him raw chicken hearts (cringe) from whole foods to further supplement his taurine intake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Read ALl reviews--1 star for quick arrival--
customer_reviews.text: I have used Science Diet for over 25 years for my canine buddies- I have NEVER received such a shock- Look inside- It smells oily- Something is all over the inside of the bag? even into the zip to lock- Returning!!
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it because my dogs like it. I had two dogs before the two I have now. The first two lived 16 and 17 years. One was a poodle and the other was a greyhound. Science diet was all that I ever fed them , and I had them both as soon as they were weaned. Always had a lot of energy. I am sure that science Dite was a contributing factor for their longevity . I highly recommend it. The two I have now are fed the same science diet as the other two. I also save a stop at the Vets office by having it shipped , and save an additional 5% on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY I found the food he will eat that is good for him
customer_reviews.text: My PICKY dog loves this food as long as I mix it with canned food. FINALLY I found the food he will eat that is good for him. I've tried a lot of high quality brands and he won't eat them most times, even with canned food and I wasted a lot of food. So for the last few years, I've given in to feeding him the cheap colored food he loves and thought it was better than not eating at all. But thanks to this food, he eats well everyday with no problems! And for a 60 pound dog, he only likes little bites type food also.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna R.

customer_reviews.title: The best dog food for our kiddos
customer_reviews.text: The best dog food for our kiddos. Their coats are super shiny, they NEVER have hots spots or dry skin. The other huge benefit about this product, is it DOES NOT leave the pups mouths smelling like they just ate dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Our fluff ball loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Food quality wise, our dog loves this stuff. She’s super picky but houses this, haven’t tried her on the lamb flavor but she’s super into the chicken. Also, it’s wonderful on her stomach! She has a pretty finicky belly and this stuff gave her zero issues! Ordered 5-6 bags off here over the last few months and have had zero issues. No busted bags, no expired food or anything. We’ve found it’s also cheaper than buying it locally so saves us a trip and a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: only kind i'll buy
customer_reviews.text: this was originally recommended by the vet. my dog was on iams from the breeder and she just didn't want to eat it. when I switched to Science diet small bites, she couldn't get enough. she won't eat anything else (tried with samples from other companies). she is now 12 and going strong, still acts like a puppy. UPDATE 08/04/18 dog is now almost 15 and still eating this and going strong. acts like a puppy with lots of energy even though she's an old lady now! she loves this brand and flavor and turns up her nose at her moist food sometimes but will always eat this stuff
customer_reviews.author: crafty

customer_reviews.title: SO glad I could get this online
customer_reviews.text: We are living overseas and my 13 yr old pup has eaten this food for most of his life. I was happy to be able to get it shipped over to us instead of switching his food. The package has been redesigned and the bag is now all plastic with a velcro-ish top, instead of the waxed paper. This made sure the food arrived incredibly fresh. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Otonio

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Scientifically speaking I don’t know if this is one of the best foods around or not. What I do know is my dogs have been eating it for over 10 years now and they never get tired of it. My dachshund is 12 years old and still plays like a puppy sometimes. He’s full of energy, has a good coat, and so far has not had any issues with cancer, kidneys, liver, etc like many dogs do. I like to think this food is part of the reason why he’s still so healthy and active.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Have been purchasing Hill's dog food locally and never had an issue. However, I bought this bag from Amazon because it was on sale. When I opened this bag, I noticed a stronger smell than the local ones, but didn't pay much mind to it. Well, fed my dog around noon, he got sick later that night and had diarrhea for 2 days after. I picked up a bag locally next morning and no problem ever since. I assume it's an old bag and the food got bad. Will only purchase locally from now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sager

customer_reviews.title: I eat less pizza and I’m losing weight!
customer_reviews.text: This is crunchy and I like the texture. The size of each piece is perfect, like that of breakfast cereal. I often pour milk over a bowl of it in the morning. I guess my only complaint is that my family won’t kiss me after I’ve eaten it. At least not until I brush my teeth or eat some food produced for humans. But I suppose that’s more of a complaint about my family and I suppose all kisses are better after having brushed one’s teeth. Also, I’ve cut down on fatty foods and I’m losing weight (before and after pics on my phone) (I guess you can’t see my phone).
customer_reviews.author: Patricia kolb

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food, my dog loves the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Again, I can't personally account for the taste of this but my sheltie seems to really like it. I mix it with a tablespoon of the cans of beef also from Science Diet. Shelties can pack on the weight, so I give him the lite variety so he won't gain. I can trust it, the ingredients are excellent. My vet recommends Science Diet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: My Corgi's Go To Brand
customer_reviews.text: All of my doggos have been on Hill's since they were puppies per my vet's recommendation. Pricing is comparable to buying in the store, but much more convenient to have delivered to my house. My corgi girl finishes the bowl fast 2x/day so she must enjoy it. I'm glad Hill's finally has a resealable bag although I empty the food into storage containers.
customer_reviews.author: hsephilly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  good price,  and healthy small dog food
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua/pomeranian 8 pound dog won't eat any other dry food than this! He's healthy and I believe that this food keeps him that way. Amazon offers this in Subscribe and Save, so I buy this monthly, and with the extra savings, it's less costly than in the local stores. It's made in the USA, and I can trust this brand to be good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Best food for our pugs.
customer_reviews.text: Our three pugs live this food. They have been caught several times, trying to bark and enter the pantry where main food bin is kept. These are well ship. Easy to handle boxes, even for the size and weight. Never had an issuse with this product, and I am very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Change in Formula - Made My Dog Sick
customer_reviews.text: Stay away!!! My dog has been eating this brand and type of dog food from Hill's Science Diet for years. We ordered this bag from Amazon and it's either a fake, old, expired or a new formula because it gave my dog awful diarrhea. We know its the food because we didn't feed it two her for two days, she was fine and the diarrhea stopped and the day we started feeding it to her again she got sick all over again. Such a waste of money and more importantly, dangerous for my beloved pet. Never ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee A.

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended, dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended this product to improve coat and skin quality and it made a huge difference. We have three large adult dogs that absolutely love this food. We’ve fed it for 2 years now and everyone still gobbles it up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product Sent
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a review so please do not consider it as such. I wanted to let you know that you sent the WRONG product. My order is for the “small bites” as I have little terriers. I have to grind this package in the food processor before I feed it to my pups. I am letting you know because this came as my “subscription” and I want to make sure you send the correct item on my next order.
customer_reviews.author: Katyastorm

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and tends to prevent hair fallout?
customer_reviews.text: My little buddy love this food. After I changed to this, he finished his bowel quicker, and could eat two to three times more than he used to eat. I was curious and tried a bite it tasted good lol. Another thing I’ve noticed is that after I switch to Hill’s, hair fall out of my corgi tends to decrease sharply! Which is amazing! I am not sure if that has 100% to do with this food, but it appears so. Will continue purchase from Hills.
customer_reviews.author: susansue

customer_reviews.title: This time, my dogs won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: We get this kind of dog food all the time from Chewy.com, but needed it quicker so ordered through Amazon. But for whatever reason, my dogs won't even eat it this time. We got a bag for work from Tractor Supply and it was fine. Do not understand why this particular bag is so bad. At 51.99 it is a bitter pill to take. That is a lot of wasted money for us.
customer_reviews.author: SuZette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: I will always use science diet. I've never had a problem. My dog has issues with other brands but this one makes him feel like a puppy again. His coat is soft and shiny, his ears dont smell as bad, his teeth have less plaque, and he likes the taste. Definitely is a healthier option for pets.
customer_reviews.author: pokedbz1691

customer_reviews.title: Great diet for furry companions!!!
customer_reviews.text: My rescue Lhasa mix was on this diet when I brought him home to be pals with my Corgi so I chose to give both of my furry companions this diet which they both thrive on....I also have an automatic shipment which saves me time and money..🐶🐕
customer_reviews.author: Twiny

customer_reviews.title: My dogs say nope.
customer_reviews.text: I personally like science diet. I bought 3 bags of this because it was on sale. My dogs hate it. Not sure why. I put a bowl of this and a bowl of eukanuba side by side and they ate all the eukanuba and none of the science diet. Not sure why but I guess I’ll switch back. What’s weird is that all 3 of my dogs did it. So strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love, mom has to keep them happy!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dog food. I’ve tried to go to cheaper brands but they don’t eat them as well. So I pay a little more for Science Diet. Plus the small bites are great for all my pups. I wish it was cheaper or Amazon would sometimes have a sale on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Poole

customer_reviews.title: I like it 😊👍
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food. I have two dogs. I really like the composition and quality of the whole product. I am often asked what I feed the dogs, I always recommend Hill's. But this is my subjective opinion. My husband is a veterinarian. He is always very strict in the selection of food for our dogs. This feed is perfect for our pets.
customer_reviews.author: Daria Koko

customer_reviews.title: Great food for a long life for your pets
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our two dogs this brand and flavor since they were puppies. They are now 9 and 8 years old and going strong! My only wish is that they wouldn't package it in a large plastic bag. Their old packaging was a paper product and could be recycled, but the large plastic bag is not.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy B Legler

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog violently ill for several days
customer_reviews.text: My dog would throw up several times a day for almost a week after switching to this food.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Descriptions says: Hills Science Diet Adult Light dog food. It doesn't say anything about "Light" on the package. ????? Whats the deal? I wanted "Light"
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Barden

customer_reviews.title: Shedding
customer_reviews.text: It made my 1 year old long hair Chihuahua shed a LOT. He never sheds or if he does it isn't noticeable. Our clothes were covered when he was eating this. He did however love the taste. But we went back to Royal Canin.
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this for a long time through Amazon for 2 small poodles. Always shows up promptly and it's well packaged. Science Diet is a quality dog food and for the price and ease of delivery, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Could probably improve on flavor
customer_reviews.text: Hills science have always been our choice. My dog doesn't enjoy eating the dry kibble straight but will destroy it with just a bit of something else added. I'm sorry to our delivery person. You're a trooper.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: My kids eat it without complaint
customer_reviews.text: I have three young dogs (1,2,3 years) that all eat it without complaint. All are healthy and the Vet always compliments us on their coats, weight, and teeth. Maybe the food is part of the equation. I get this as part of the Subscription service and it always arrives on time at the door step.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: dog got sick
customer_reviews.text: Have been ordering Hills from Amazon for a year without any issues. However, opened a new bag and fed my dog in the am. She got very sick later that day, lasted for 3 days. I threw out the bag and bought new food locally. Have not had issues since. I assume the food was bad, maybe got hot in a warehouse somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Markey

customer_reviews.title: Puppies like it
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product, puppies really like eating it and someimes ask for a couple more pieces. If they could type they would give it 5 stars. Good for high energy puppies that like to go for long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Evlmarine

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality dog food. When I go to the vet and am asked what food we use, they say, "Oh, you give them the good stuff!" Obviously, this is considered to be quality food be the vets as well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Dog allergic to chicken
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is chicken and my dog is allergic to chicken. I got the lamb instead. The chicken was a mistake
customer_reviews.author: Laylaemily

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. The one is an incredibly picky eater. I also love knowing I get the quality food they need and the convenience of it being delivered to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_of_bums

customer_reviews.title: New formula gave our dog hives
customer_reviews.text: We have feed feeding our rescue the original formula of this food for 6 months. Our Minnie loves the food and our vet recommended it. But after the new formulation came out and we had fed it our dog, she started getting very noticeable hives. We tried everything, including medication, but it wasn't until we went locally to find a bag of the old formula and switched her food back that we saw her hives go away. That's a real shame because we were very happy with the food otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, and he is more energy and healthy after eating. The price is affordable because you are difficult to find the cheap dog food with 35 lbs like that. Moreover, it’s designed for my corgi dog with chicken favor.
customer_reviews.author: Thao Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Hills! My vet recommended it! This is the best deal on this product that I have found anywhere. With amazon prime free shipping, I don't think I will purchase Moses' food Anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Science Diet dog food.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food. Never had any problems with the food. The dogs like it and I like the small kibble for the smaller dog. I can't comment on the flavor as I haven't tried it, but the dogs seem to like it. I like having it delivered to the house and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Big Show

customer_reviews.title: Past four years and seems to be doing very well on it.
customer_reviews.text: As far as the flavor goes, you’d have to ask my dog. He seems to love it and has been on this diet for the Past four years and seems to be doing very well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Food / Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fresh, we have been buying this for years. Every dog is different, our little girl love it! We are happy with the price and product. And that we didn’t have drive across town to go get it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: First, it is Science Diet so you know it is good. Second the size of the kibble is great for dogs that have teeth problem. The only thing that concerns me is that when Science Diet changed the food formula a few years ago that chicken is now not the first ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Lee

customer_reviews.title: My dogs prefer it.
customer_reviews.text: I switched dog food from Science Diet to another quality brand for a few months, and my 3 dogs were not happy. They would smell the food and walk away. So I went back to Science Diet and they can't wait to eat again!!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: This kibble is so fresh and a great change from other drier kibble.
customer_reviews.text: We switched from a grain free type because of statements made that grain free brands increased the risk of heart disease in dogs. The kibble in this new brand, Hill’s, looks so much better and our older puppy caught on right away to the change. She loves Hill’s and we’re happy the change excited her.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer_plhughes64

customer_reviews.title: bought Jan 2020. Expires Mar 2021 in 13 mo. Hills SD Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: was concerned about the expiration as i will take a while to consume two 35# bags but they do not expire until Mar 2021. Science Diet used to be good quality company, I will have to see how well may dog takes to this. This is not diet dog food for elderly dogs, but regular dry kibbles.
customer_reviews.author: bulldogger

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu has a sensitive belly and have never had an issue with this Hills line
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and very good, but you may need to add a bit more flavor to it
customer_reviews.text: This is really good dry dog food. It is expensive, and you may need to mix something into it that has more flavor. I order this for mother's dogs, because I want them to be healthy and well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan713105

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Written by Mia... 12 year old Yorkie: My mom buys my “crunchies” from Amazon. I love my Hills Science Diet. It’s puppy- licious!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong science diet. Should’ve been for senior dogs but my dogs liked it small bites for small dogs. I trust science diet for my aging dogs
customer_reviews.author: Pattig00

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for my dog for 10 year old dog for past 10 years; she is very healthy, energetic and people usually think she is a puppy; this is the best brand and the best product for my dog;
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was great and the food is fresh. My dog loves it. He can smell the food before it is out of the box. Oh and yes he is a Pembroke Welsh Corgi :D
customer_reviews.author: Nancy careauTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My dog food
customer_reviews.text: AND FOR PRICE THAT WAS A REAL GOOD DEAL.MY VET SAID THAT THIS DOG FOOD IS BEST FOR ANY DOG OR DOGS. MY DOG PEPPER REALLY LIKE THE TASTE AND HAS ALL THE RIGHT INGREDIENTS.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Shimozaki

customer_reviews.title: Food our humane society gave us! Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was the food that our humane society gave with our rescue. 15lb chihuahua mix loves it! 5/5 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, for dog food. Makes me feel good about what I feed my dogs. One of the only foods my dogs will eat up without adding warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Han

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this food. She has sensitive skin and we have struggled to find a food that she likes and agrees with skin. I think we found our solution.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes smaller bites and he always finishes this food. I have to assume he likes it and it's fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Dog actually lost weight
customer_reviews.text: Our dog need to lose a few pounds. This did the job. She continues to like this dry dog food. Been buying Science Diet for years.
customer_reviews.author: Wan Wan

customer_reviews.title: Hill Science Diet
customer_reviews.text: This dog food was recommended by our Veterinarian. Our dog eats it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: I add fresh chopped vegetables and mix for my dogs and they enjoy it very much. They don’t shed and their coat is soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for poochies
customer_reviews.text: The pooches love this want eat any other dry food add Alpo top sirloin on the side. They share bowls now and even the cat wants to get in the action of this food, they want eat their meow mix, lol. Its little bites
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the tiny pieces for tiny dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the tiny pieces. My dogs are 3 to 5 lbs and needed a dog food with little piecez. They also like it. Eat it well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs just love this food! It is consistently fresh! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw59

customer_reviews.title: Princess loves it
customer_reviews.text: the pieces are small. My 3 year old puggle has no problems with digesting this food. It was highly recommended by the Vet. My cat even loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Kazarian

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My labradoodle likes this one but he hasn t shared with me what he likes best: quality, flavor, or freshness
customer_reviews.author: Afd

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food for my dog , he lost weight.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his food and I certainly love the price and the Picture of the cute Corgi , as a corgi owner we both love the product
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Domìnguez

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item. Ordered SMALL bites, got Large ...
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong item. Ordered SMALL bites, got Large Breed. Unfortunately, didn't notice until I sliced open the package and poured it into our food dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Kooter

customer_reviews.title: Puppies love it

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food, Adult, Small Bites, Chicken & Barley Recipe
product_meta.description: Size:35 LB BagLittle dogs can have a big appetite, so treat your small-breed dog to Hill's Science Diet Small Bites Adult dry dog food. Packed with omega-6s & Vitamin E to give your canine a beautiful skin & coat, this premium adult dog food also provides high-quality protein to help your full grown dog maintain lean muscle. The small kibble is perfect for small and toy breeds, and since adult dogs need a strong gut, natural fibers help promote healthy digestion. This adult dog food made with natural ingredients is specially formulated with decades of cutting-edge research to be a great-tasting meal your adult dog can truly enjoy. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.
feature_bullets: A dry dog food with easy-to-digest ingredients to fuel the energy needs of adult canines, with a little kibble
This dry food for small-breed dogs provides omega-6s & vitamin E for healthy skin & coat
Provides your adult little dog with high-quality protein for maintaining lean muscle
Promotes healthy digestion for your adult dog with natural fibers
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
